text: On my  th birthday    I will kill myselfIf my life improves before then  I will reconsider  But I promise to myself that if things remain as they are  I won t let this worthless life continue  Besides  you never saw yourself making it to age   anyways  it s only fair This is a scary thing to write down for me  because I don t seem to like to set things in stone  But I know that if I set this date  I won t be able to run and hide from my feelings anymore I guess I ve passed the threshold of truly suicidal  instead of some little gay bitch who never gets things done If it comes to that day and I m ready to do the deed  I ll post the past years worth of shit I ve written down on my phone notes to help cope  No point in keeping my feelings a secret when I m dead  I might as well tell my jumbled mess of a story I shamefully apologize to everyone in my life who this may affect  This has been years in the making  and it s finally time to act
summary: On his th birthday he will kill himself. If his life improves before then he will reconsider. He will post the past years worth of notes he wrote on his phone notes to cope with his depression on the Internet. He apologizes to everyone in his life who may be affected by his suicide plans.

text: First Time Crying In   YearsThis is the first time I ve ever expressed to anyone my intense suicidal ideations beyond the normal talks of depression with my therapist without any mention of such I m afraid of mental hospital and the social implications of attending them  Currently I m gonna fail out of college see depression and it s impact on motivation  and I think I ve reached my limit  My mental health is close to the worst it s been in the past   years and I honestly have no idea how I m gonna make it through the next few months without killing myself  With winter approaching and the additional effects of SAD looming over me I feel it s better to try and succeed now then go through the unnecessary pain that will undoubtedly follow  My decision is practically made and I really don t care about myself at this point but I m worried about the effects it ll have on my friends and family  especially if I fail  This is why I took my time with this to prepare and to hopefully get it right  After the realization of what I was thinking about doing over the past two weeks finally hit me today when I broke down and cried for the first time since my dog died when I was   This time though from what I can compare of the experiences  the crying felt almost hollow and maybe more of a relief  Anyway I think tomorrow is my best bet to commit as it s right before thanksgiving and after time with family I know I ll have no energy and drive to do anything meaningful  I feel myself really slipping already and I think I m about mentally prepared to follow through  Goodbye I guess  I m not quite sure why I m writing this  don t say it s because you want to live deep down  but it s kinda funny to me now that the first and last time I reached out will be the same  as that would truly be something I d do  Peace and gl everybody else in their struggles
summary: Today I broke down and cried for the first time since my dog died. Tomorrow I'm going to commit suicide. It's better to try and succeed now than go through the unnecessary pain that will follow if I fail out of college. The decision is practically made.

text: Should I just do it  Idk anymoreThere was sadness  so much sadness  I was scared to feel it When I was smaller I used to think boys weren t supposed to feel sad  or bad about themselves  or even anxious  one day I started crying and nobody was around  it was the day the garden was tainted  it was the day that marked the beginning of my depression and eventually my thoughts  anyway I was scared that I was feeling this way because at the time I knew that men were supposed to be  tall  strapping  proud  strong  supportive  and never sad  but thats not how I felt  I was scared  I was in emotional pain  i wanted to scream  but instead i cried alone on the couch silently as my family slept  blissfully unaware Sadly this took place when I was  When I was seven I was coming home from school and I thought  would people stop bullying me if I just died  a strange thought at the time as you could imagine but as time went on I started seeing multiple problems that could have everybody happy if I was never there Alan Alan the failure  Alan the screwup You know what  You should just fucking die  my best friend at the time The thought of my death making the world a better place  It was a thought that never left my mind Just think of what they will say  I told myself About time I m only disappointed it didn t happen sooner Good riddance Finally Maybe thinking my death would make somebody s life easier was just me covering up that fact that I just want to end it all Selfish much What do you think  Should I Sometimes people say  people will miss you if you die  But I ve realized something  within a month they ll get over me Alan  a useless   yo
